features.title: Feature Pertama
features.description: Bear works on iPhone, iPad, and Mac, so you can write wherever inspiration strikes. Use todos to stay on task across every device.

features.title: Ready when you need it
features.description: Bear works on iPhone, iPad, and Mac, so you can write wherever inspiration strikes. Use todos to stay on task across every device.

features.title: Organize easily
features.description: Link notes to each other to build a body of work. Add hashtags to organize the way you think. Use Face/Touch ID to protect sensitive notes.

features.title: Write your way
features.description: Bear works on iPhone, iPad, and Mac, so you can write wherever inspiration strikes. Use todos to stay on task across every device.

features.title: Gorgeous settings
features.description: Packed with beautiful themes and typography and Dark Mode, Bear makes your writing look great before and after publishing.
